fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Each night, select a word with at least five letters to maleidct. During the next day, the first person to say that word becomes Cursed.
- Once per game, jinx all Cursed players, roleblocking and attacking them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Cursed players appear to be a random Coven role.
- With the Necromonicon, you may Curse up to three people each day and may attack any Cursed player each night.
